summary: Dr. Frankenstein's plans to replace the brain of his monster are hijacked by his scheming and malevolent assistant Ygor.
cast: Lon Chaney Jr.|Cedric Hardwicke|Ralph Bellamy|Lionel Atwill|Bela Lugosi|Evelyn Ankers|Janet Ann Gallow|Barton Yarborough|Doris Lloyd|Leyland Hodgson|Olaf Hytten|Holmes Herbert|Richard Alexander|Lionel Belmore|Chet Brandenburg|Colin Clive|Harry Cording|George Eldredge|Dwight Frye|Lawrence Grant|Otto Hoffman|Brandon Hurst|Michael Mark|Jimmy Phillips|William Smith|Ernie Stanton|Julius Tannen|Harry Tenbrook|Glen Walters|Janet Warren
title: El fantasma de Frankenstein
